Title: A defining year for capacity building in Lagos State
Summary: The year 2025 has unfolded as an extraordinary chapter in the story of the Lagos State Public Service . It is, without doubt, a defining year for capacity building in Lagos state .

Title: Boko Haram insurgents torch houses, vehicles in fresh attacks on Borno community
Summary: Boko Haram insurgents torched dozens of houses and vehicles in fresh attacks on Magumeri community of Borno State . Insurgents have torched houses, vehicles and burnt vehicles . The attacks are part of a fresh campaign against Boko Haram in Borno .

Title: UNN emerges second best in Global Interdisciplinary Science rankings
Summary: The University of Nigeria, Nsukka (UNN) has been ranked second best in Nigeria and 161st globally in the newly released 2026 Global Interdisciplinary Science rankings . UNN emerges second best in Nigeria in the new rankings .

Title: Controversy trails Atiku’s ADC registration as party declares process invalid
Summary: Controversy trails Atiku’s registration as party declares process invalid . The national leadership of the African Democratic Congress (ADC) yesterday clarified that former vice president Atiku Abubakar .

Summary: Nigeria has signalled a decisive push to lead Africa’s single-market ambitions with the opening of the maiden African Continental Free Trade . Oduwole: How Nigeria can leverage Africa's $3.4 trillion single market .

Title: UK, Canada, Australia unveil joint campaign against visa fraud
Summary: UK, Australia and Canada unveil joint international campaign to combat visa fraud . Initiative, tagged: #FightingVisaFraud campaign, was unveiled during International Fraud Awareness Week .

Title: Reps moves to tackle rising POS fraud, unlicensed crypto activities
Summary: House of Representatives Ad-hoc Committee investigating risks associated with cryptocurrency adoption and Point-of-Sale (POS) operations raised fresh concerns over what it described as a rapidly worsening fraud crisis threatening Nigeria's financial system .

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, November 25, 2025
Summary: The Nigerian naira traded around ₦1,456 to the US dollar in the official Daily Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) on Tuesday .

Title: Renaissance takes energy security advocacy to Ibadan varsity
Summary: Renaissance Africa Energy Company Limited has taken its energy security and industrialisation advocacy to the University of Ibadan varsity . Renaissance is committed to education, youth empowerment, and community development . Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Renaissance, Tony Attah, hinged the economic emancipation and growth of Nigeria .
